name: digger
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a machine used for digging: a mechanical digger
Ken Welsh/The Image Bank/GettyImages
Australian English a person who mines for gold (= removes it from under the ground) See also
gold digger
Australian English informal an Australian soldier, especially one who fought in the First World War
